attributes.action: New cats eyes on the A703 road from Peebles to Edinburgh
attributes.additional_details: It’s been done at howgate and has made such a difference but why are you stopping there?
attributes.background: The roads in the borders are awful. Paint is all faded and cats eyes don’t even work. These roads are so dangerous. At night when cars come towards your car you are guessing to find the road. The amount of accidents is ridiculous. This needs sorted.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of the Scottish Government or your local council.
